Generation IX.Scarlet: The ball of threads wrapped around its body is elastic enough to deflect the scythes of Scyther , this Pokémon’s natural enemy.
Generation IX.Violet: The thread it secretes from its rear is as strong as wire. The secret behind the thread's strength is the topic of ongoing research.

Generation IX.Scarlet: South Province: Area One , Area Two , Area Three , Area Four , Area Five , Cabo Poco , Poco Path , Pokémon League North Province: Socarrat Trail Tera Raid Battles ( 1★ )
Generation IX.Violet: South Province: Area One , Area Two , Area Three , Area Four , Area Five , Cabo Poco , Poco Path , Pokémon League North Province: Socarrat Trail Tera Raid Battles ( 1★ )
